about_the_game:
Discover the Magic of Amaroo's Christmas Shop Simulator with This Limited Prologue!

Step into a festive world where you can create, manage, and grow your dream Christmas shop! This prologue offers a glimpse of the full game, allowing you to design your ideal store and experience the joy of running a holiday business. Don’t forget to wishlist the full game to unlock even more exciting features and extend the holiday fun!

Design Your Perfect Christmas Shop

Bring your festive vision to life by crafting a charming Christmas shop. Decorate with Christmas trees, garlands, ornaments, and more. Personalize every detail, from wall and floor colors to enchanting festive displays, and transform your shop into the ultimate winter wonderland.

Stock, Sell, and Expand

Curate an inventory filled with seasonal gifts and holiday essentials. Set competitive prices, track best-sellers, and ensure shelves are stocked to satisfy customer demand. As your shop thrives, unlock opportunities to expand your store, offering more products and drawing in larger crowds.

Sign License Agreements for New Products

Take your shop to the next level by partnering with suppliers and signing license agreements to stock exclusive, high-demand items. From branded ornaments to unique gifts, diversify your offerings and keep customers coming back for more!

Balance Costs, Profits, and Growth

Manage your finances carefully, balancing expenses like decorations, inventory, and expansion costs. Will you create a cozy neighborhood shop or grow into a grand Christmas empire? Every decision you make impacts your success, putting the future of your shop entirely in your hands!
